backend/main.mo: Empty actor module with a comment pointing to the permanent live deployment URL.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing deployment-related features, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining slug rules and stepâ€‘byâ€‘step instructions for deploying to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the Valentine theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the Valentine-themed page title.
frontend/LIVE_URL.md: Document recording the permanent live site URL and deployment details for the Valentineâ€™s Surprise app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the Valentine greeting, floating hearts, puzzle CTA, puzzle section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationSpark: Generates sparkle particles and heart confetti animations as a celebratory overlay.
frontend/src/components/CoolingFan.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Creates 15 animated floating heart images with randomized movement and timing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying a simple credit message "Credits: Brother".
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing the Valentine greeting with animated heart icons.
frontend/src/components/HeartPuzzleCTA.t: Heartâ€‘themed button toggling the visibility of the puzzle section.
frontend/src/components/JigsawPuzzleName: Canvas-based jigsaw puzzle rendering "Love you akka ðŸ’–" with draggable pieces and completion detection.
frontend/src/components/PuzzleRevealSect: Controls puzzle visibility, completion handling, and triggers celebration effects and message reveal.
frontend/src/components/ValentineMessage: Animated Valentine message card with heart icons and styled text revealed on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, Valentine-themed color variables, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, color tokens, plugins, and extended UI settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, deployment issues, and feature requests related to domain validation and publishing.
